title: Crab
body: Have you guys seen that giant crab in melbourne??? it's moving over to perth now!

replies.body: your a few hrs late there buddy
I was on a holiday overseas. I returned to Melbourne to find my home crushed and my family killed!

>
> I was on a holiday overseas. I returned to Melbourne to find my home crushed and my family killed!

oh lord {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Yes, we must call the gem army to sort this one out.

stop this cringey rp lol
He is bloody fast how he got from Melbourne to Perth in 1 day.
fat crabs have their advantages I guess
Giant enemy Crabgot is doing work.
